name: flowery
content:
flowery adjective
(FLOWERS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also flowered, uk/ˈflaʊ.əd/ us/ˈflaʊ.ɚd/) decorated with pictures of flowers: a flowery material/dress flowery curtains/wallpaper

flowery adjective
(WORDS)
disapproving If a speech or writing style is flowery, it uses too many complicated words or phrases in an attempt to sound skilful: a flowery description/speech
